development.pre-setup: cd /usr/share/nginx/html/ && sudo mkdir -p btapp && sudo chmod 777 btapp
development.pre-deploy-local: echo 'This is a local executed command'

production.pre-setup: cd /usr/share/nginx/html/ && sudo mkdir -p btapp && sudo chmod 777 btapp
production.pre-deploy-local: echo 'This is a local executed command'
production.post-deploy: npm install && npm run-script build && echo 'Deployment Completed !!!'
